name: Boo And Oreo
description:
Boo and Oreo is a 2D platformer game with the objective of reuniting Boo, the cat, and Oreo, the dog together! Boo and Oreo happen to live on the opposite sides of the neighborhood, and the challenge  of the game is for the player to avoid interacting with the evil birds or the evil skunks on the way to Oreo's doghouse.  

Producer/Lead Programmer: Kirsty Lastra

Programmer: Victoria Nguyễn

Artist/Designer: Josie Pan 

Music: Bensound.com
